resources.string: Welcome to the DVLA app for checking vehicle tax
This handy little app will help you find out if a vehicle is taxed or is on SORN (Statutory Off Road Notification)
On the next page you will be able to submit a Vehicle Registration Mark, which will be checked against the DVLA Vehicle Records
If the vehicle is untaxed, you can help DVLA with the investigation of non-taxed vehicles by submitting a photo of the vehicle through this app.
This process is anonymous and will help DVLA improve compliance on keeping a vehicle up to date.
According to the DVLA Vehicle Records this Vehicle is currently taxed.
According to the DVLA Vehicle Records this Vehicle is currently Un-taxed.
According to the DVLA this Vehicle is not in our records.
Please enter Reg Mark of the Vehicle
Please be aware that if you have taxed, made a SORN or had an MOT in the last 5 days these details may not have been updated.
Please submit photographic evidence on the next page to help DVLA with their investigation.
Thank you\n\nThis vehicle is not currently taxed according to our records
Thank you\n\nBecause of you we now have a record of where this vehicle is kept.
